title: 40% of South Africans Familiar With the ‘Concept of Web3’ — Study
description: Some 40% of South African survey participants are familiar with the concept of Web3 and a further 80% believe the technology backing cryptocurrencies can “transform or fully rebuild the financial system,” according to the findings of a Consensys survey. However, as much as 59% believe scams are among the main barriers stopping many from dabbling […]

title: Cardano Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is ADA a good investment?
